channel.title: ir on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in ir on Analyst

item.title: üî• Detection Devices
item.description: Host-based IDS look for local system configurations and behaviour, while network-based IDS look for network connections and looks for anomalies and common signatures.

item.title: üóí Incident Response Methodology
item.description: Preparation üìù Compile a list of all your assets (servers, networks, applications etc) üìà Rank them by level of importance.

item.title: Case 1. Famous Retailer Data Breach
item.description: Case Overview The Target Corporation is an American retailing company, founded in 1902 and headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

item.title: Case 2. Watering Hole Attack
item.description: Case Overview Watering hole is an attack strategy in which an attacker guesses or observes which websites an organization often uses and infects one or more of them with malware.

item.title: Case 3. Phishing against Google and Facebook
item.description: Case Overview In summary, according to the US attorney’s office for the Southern District of New York, scammers stole over $100 million from Facebook and Google in a creative way.

item.title: Case 4. SANS Mock Case
item.description: Case Overview Arya Stark gets an email presumably from Direwolf with an attachment. It looks suspicious and she forwards it to the Security.

item.title: Case 5. IBM Example
item.description: Case Overview Arya Stark gets an email presumably from Direwolf with an attachment. It looks suspicious and she forwards it to the Security.

item.title: Case 6. Home Depot PoS Attack
item.description: Case Overview This attack started from stealing credentials from a vendor, using them to install malware on around 7500 self-checkout POS terminals and then stealing data.

item.title: Case 7. Atlanta Ransomware Attack
item.description: Case Overview 22 March, 2018 the City of Atlanta suffered from a ransomware attack. Many devices at City Hall were shutdown.

item.title: Case 8. Kaseya Supply Chain Ransomware Attack
item.description: Case Overview Timeline Lessons Learned References [1] Kaseya Supply Chain Ransomware Attack - Technical Analysis of the REvil Payload
